title: Ticket #4254: Consider adding setarch reminder on startup
description: Stuart Anderson suggests that, rather than assuming he'll remember to prepend 'setarch x86_64 -R -L' every time he runs a standard universe binary in stand-alone checkpointing mode, that the standard universe banner 'Condor: Notice: ...' includes a reminder -- ideally only if setarch is needed but wasn't used -- about it.
creator: tlmiller
